ygData.subject: Re: Decepticons
ygData.msgSnippet: Sinnertwin gets creamed by Rippersnapper. In a hurt voice he wimpers something. Want to rest now, no fight he screams, trying to put his arms on the ground.

Sinnertwin gets creamed by Rippersnapper. In a hurt voice he wimpers
something. "Want to rest now, no fight" he screams, trying to put his
arms on the ground.

Motormaster turns to this disturbance and fires his Cyclone gun in the
middle.

Wildrider walks into the base, and towards Switchblades lair.
"Swithcblade, I got something for you he ha ha ha" he trails off.

Megatron looks at the two new robots. "Yes, show them no mercy, I want
no more Prisoners. Understand?" he asks harshly.
